services.name: Cloud Resource Management Service
services.description: This service allows organizations to efficiently manage their cloud-based infrastructure, ensuring optimal performance and security. Features include resource allocation, monitoring, and scaling.

services.name: User Authentication and Authorization API
services.description: Provides a secure means for registering users, managing credentials, and ensuring proper access control across applications.

services.name: Data Analysis Automation Tool
services.description: Enables businesses to integrate and analyze data sets, generate actionable insights, and export results in preferred formats.

services.name: Cybersecurity Risk Assessment API
services.description: Offers organizations tools to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in their system networks.

services.name: Software Version Control Integration API
services.description: Facilitates smooth operations of version control repositories, enhancing coordination among development teams.
